title: Sound Simulation-Based Online Education for Improving Cardiac Auscultation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of cardiac anatomy and circulatory system, experience using a stethoscope
context.additional_context: Training for medical device sales company employees, aiming to enhance customer education capabilities. Content must be accessible via smartphone-based platforms.

learning_goals: Identify seven major abnormal heart sounds (third heart sound, double gallop, aortic stenosis/regurgitation, mitral stenosis/regurgitation, pericardial friction rub) with 80% accuracy.
Improve clinical judgment skills based on patient conditions when applying auscultation techniques.
Achieve an average improvement of at least 60% in diagnostic accuracy in post-training evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
